revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Professor Elm || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Technology Enthusiast || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]] || Tells the player about [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Chest mechanics |- | Mr. Pokémon || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cherrygrove City]] || Teaches the player about the [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatchery]] Queue feature. |- | Earl Dervish || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Violet City]] || Teaches the player about [[Baby Pokémon]]. |- | Wise Old Man || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Azalea Town]] || Tells the player about the [[Ilex Forest|location]] and [[Gyms#Johto_Indigo_Plateau|requirement]] needed to unlock Celebi. |- | Bill || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player the requirements of Espeon and Umbreon. |- | Eusine || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player about the requirement of the [[Roaming_Pokémon|requirement]] to unlock the Roaming legendary Beasts . |- | Pokéfan Derek || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player that they now have access to the three legendary Beasts. |- | Kimono Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player about the [[Tin Tower|location]] and [[Roaming_Pokémon|requirement]] needed to unlock Ho-Oh. |- | Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] || Teaches the player about the Shop amount button. |- | SS Aqua Captain || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Olivine City]] || Tells the player about the [[Dock]]. |- | Photography Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cianwood City]] || Tells the player about [[Berries#Wandering_Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]]. |- | Souvenir Shop Attendant || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Mahogany Town]] || Tells the player about [[Item Magnet]] effects. |- | Pokéfan Trevor || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Blackthorn City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
